name: In King's Memory
description:
In King’s Memory is a game where the protagonist, a rogue, is trying to steal the King’s most valuable treasure risking his life through traps and puzzles.

Project made in 3 days for the Jam: SpeedJam by ScoreSpace.

Developers:

  • TenseTeam
    • Lorenzo Rocco a.k.a. "Zig" - Game Designer / VFX / Voice Actor
    • Luigi Ramundo a.k.a. "Ludrax" - 3D/2D Artist
    • Eva Cidini a.k.a. "evabbe" - Concept Artist
    • Denis Faraci a.k.a. "Voyder" - Game Programmer

External Pre-Made Assets:
